favorites_inbox.name: Lionel Messi
favorites_inbox.subject: In this life we cannot do great things. We can only do small things with great love.

favorites_inbox.name: Cristiano Ronaldo
favorites_inbox.subject: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

favorites_inbox.name: Kylian Mbappe
favorites_inbox.subject: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.

favorites_inbox.name: Neymar Jr.
favorites_inbox.subject: Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air.

favorites_inbox.name: Karim Benzema
favorites_inbox.subject: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.

favorites_sent.name: Kevin De Bruyne
favorites_sent.subject: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

favorites_sent.name: Bruno Fernandes
favorites_sent.subject: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.

favorites_sent.name: Toni Kroos
favorites_sent.subject: Do not let making a living prevent you from making a life.

favorites_sent.name: Luka Modric
favorites_sent.subject: Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.

favorites_sent.name: Bernardo Silva
favorites_sent.subject: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

john_inbox.name: Thiago Silva
john_inbox.subject: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing

john_inbox.name: Raphael Varane
john_inbox.subject: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma – which is living with the results of other people's thinking.

john_inbox.name: Gerard Pique
john_inbox.subject: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.

john_inbox.name: Virgil van Dijk
john_inbox.subject: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.

john_inbox.name: Sergio Ramos
john_inbox.subject: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.

john_drafts.name: Paul Pogba
john_drafts.subject: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.

john_drafts.name: N'golo Kante
john_drafts.subject: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on

john_drafts.name: Casemiro
john_drafts.subject: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.

john_drafts.name: Sergio Busquets
john_drafts.subject: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.

john_drafts.name: Jorginho
john_drafts.subject: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams

john_deleted.name: Son Heung Min
john_deleted.subject: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.

john_deleted.name: Vinicius Jr.
john_deleted.subject: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched — they must be felt with the heart.

john_deleted.name: Ousmane Dembele
john_deleted.subject: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.

john_deleted.name: Phil Foden
john_deleted.subject: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.

john_deleted.name: Bukayo Saka
john_deleted.subject: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

john_sent.name: Erling Haaland
john_sent.subject: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.

john_sent.name: Robert Lewandowski
john_sent.subject: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.

john_sent.name: Olivier Giroud
john_sent.subject: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.

john_sent.name: Luis Suarez
john_sent.subject: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.

john_sent.name: Harry Kane
john_sent.subject: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.

john_outbox.name: Mohamed Salah
john_outbox.subject: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.

john_outbox.name: Eden Hazard
john_outbox.subject: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.

john_outbox.name: Sadio Mane
john_outbox.subject: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.

john_outbox.name: Angel Di Maria
john_outbox.subject: Life is never fair, and perhaps it is a good thing for most of us that it is not.

john_outbox.name: Ivan Perisic
john_outbox.subject: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
